name: Icarus Odyssey
description:
Icarus Odyssey

This strategy game is about the humanity and a eminent end. The scientists
 discovery that the sun will explode destroying all the closest planets.
For preserve the humanity, a spaceship named Icarus was build for discovery
 others planets and escape of this tragedy.

Objective: Colonize the Last Planet of the Solar System

Game Control:
      W
    A S D       ===> Control de Camera
(In Planets)
Right MouseBTN  ===> Mining Menu
Left MouseBTN   ===> Resources Menu
